Attributes.description: Physical consequences of Einstein's equations, including the principle of equivalence, curved space-time, geodesics, the Schwarzschild solution, deflection of light, black holes, and gravitational radiation.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of MATH 217, MATH 227, MATH 317 and one of MATH 215, MATH 255. (PHYS 301 and one of PHYS 206, PHYS 306 are recommended.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 12:00, End Time: 13:00, Building: Hebb, Room: 116
